results.name: Inverse permutation to A276953.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences related to factorial base representation
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of other permutations:
program: (Scheme) (define (A276954 n) (let ((col (A276951 n)) (row (A276949 n))) (* (/ 1 2) (- (expt (+ row col) 2) row col col col -2))))
xref: Related or similar permutations: A257504, A275847.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 22 2016
